thread.title: Horror Filmmaker Wes Craven Dies at 76
thread.title_full: Horror Filmmaker Wes Craven Dies at 76 - WSJ

author: wsjcom
title: Horror Filmmaker Wes Craven Dies at 76
text:
Wes Craven, whose “Nightmare on Elm Street” and “Scream” movies made him one of the most recognizable names in the horror film genre, has died. He was 76 years old.
Mr. Craven’s family said in a statement that he died in his Los Angeles home Sunday after battling brain cancer.
A prolific writer, director and editor, Mr. Craven was... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
